name: Emotional Resilience Protocols
description: Training to maintain emotional stability and override external influence.

cards.title: Disrupting Emotional Hijacking
cards.description: Techniques for breaking free from emotionally manipulative traps.
cards.bulletpoints: Pattern Interruption, Emotional Distance Exercises, Cognitive Overriding

cards.title: Anchoring in Emotional Neutrality
cards.description: Stabilizing emotional responses to prevent external triggers from taking control.
cards.bulletpoints: Emotional Grounding, Controlled Detachment, Response Delay Training

cards.title: Unshakable Self-Identity
cards.description: Strengthening core identity to ensure emotional resilience under extreme psychological pressure.
cards.bulletpoints: Sovereign Mindset Installation, Thought Shielding, Core Belief Hardening
